entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Lambton Shores
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:38 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -12.0°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
